channel.title: Hackers
channel.description:
Over the last week my Servers been 'Hacked'
They make themself and others Admin, they drop items, change peoples passwords, Ban people.
I IP Ban and they come right back. They use a proxy 71.114._.125 [_= any number 0-99 they can pick] i banned them all and nothing.
They say they use a cheat client and 3 other tools.
I've recorded a conversation on msn where he said some stuff how he does it. If anyone could help please pm me, post here or msn me [support@stewiescape.com]
He said something about client auto updating and an error in server.java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2009, 04:38:11 am[/size][hr]If you want to download the MSN chat here: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KXOTMWQU
